name: Vizzual
tag_list: forms, visual, data-management-system, invite, coolaboration, data-collection, data-storage, data-processing
overview:
Vizzualforms is a web based data management system created for collecting, storing and processing data via the Internet. It allows to create and publish web forms in mere minutes without any programming knowledge and advanced computer skills.

It includes visual form creator, data processing tool, contact manager, invitation module and report tool.

With Vizzualforms users can create broad spectrum of forms, invite others to fill in the forms and see or share the results in real time. Integrated email notification system that can send email with data to mailbox each time form is submitted guaranteeing that no request or data will be missed. Forms created with vizzualforms.com can be embedded into web page or delivered using invitation module.

The idea of VizzualForms is to allow users to create even the most complicated forms in a simple manner. There is nothing to install and nothing to maintain.
